issue.title: [Go] add initial support for Go modules
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3130](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3130). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Go1.11 has been released and provides initial support for Go modules, a new way to properly handle (module) version management.

we should start to add some support for this.
